spell.invoke.agonizingblast.description: Blast enemies three times in a straight line. Each blast deals {damage} arcane spell damage and triggers eight more blasts shooting in a circle around the first enemy it hits, which each in turn trigger eight more blasts should they find a target, and so on. Cannot infinitely repeat.
spell.invoke.agonizingblast.name: Agonizing Blast
spell.invoke.amethystburst.description: Launch eight amethysts in a wide spread which home into their target, should you have one selected. Each amethyst deals {damage} arcane spell damage.
spell.invoke.amethystburst.name: Amethyst Burst
spell.invoke.arcane_launch.description: Launch an enemy into the sky, dealing {damage} arcane damage.
spell.invoke.arcane_launch.name: Arcane Launch
spell.invoke.arcane_nova.description: Perform an arcane nova, dealing {damage} arcane damage to enemies nearby..
spell.invoke.arcane_nova.name: Arcane Nova
spell.invoke.arcaneoverdrive.description: Perform a nova, dealing {damage} arcane damage to enemies around you, and giving yourself a stacking attack speed buff. Can be triggered on hit.
spell.invoke.arcaneoverdrive.name: Arcane Shillelagh
spell.invoke.armageddon.description: Channel to summon small meteors over the target, dealing {damage} fire damage per meteor per second.
spell.invoke.armageddon.name: Armageddon
spell.invoke.blink.name: Blink
spell.invoke.buckshot.description: Shoot 12 tiny meteor fragments in a cone, each dealing {damage} fire spell damage.
spell.invoke.buckshot.name: Meteor Shrapnel Shot
spell.invoke.chill.description: Blast an enemy with frozen energies, slowing them and dealing {damage} frost damage.
spell.invoke.chill.name: Deep Chill
spell.invoke.combust.description: Enemies in front of you explode, taking {damage} fire damage.
spell.invoke.combust.name: Combust
spell.invoke.combustion.description: Shoot a high speed volatile meteorite fragment in a direction, dealing {damage} fire spell damage in an 12 block radius around the first target hit.
spell.invoke.combustion.name: Volatile Meteor Shot
spell.invoke.deathchill.description: Channel to freeze everyone around you in a large area for 10 seconds, refreshing as they stay in the area.
spell.invoke.deathchill.name: Deathchill
spell.invoke.deep_chill.description: All enemies in a cone in front of you slow to a crawl and take {damage} frost damage.
spell.invoke.deep_chill.name: Snowfall
spell.invoke.eldritch_blast.description: Launch piercing eldritch projectiles at all enemies in a large cone in front of you, each dealing {damage} arcane damage.
spell.invoke.eldritch_blast.name: Eldritch Blast
spell.invoke.enders_gaze.description: Summon five rotating ender eyes around a target, each dealing {damage} arcane spell damage every 2/5ths of a second for 4 seconds. The eyes detach upon the death of their host, reattaching to the nearest enemy and refreshing the duration.
spell.invoke.enders_gaze.name: Ender's Gaze
spell.invoke.essence_drain.description: Unleash a deadly contagion projectile, which ricochets off of enemies. When it ricochets, it deals {damage} frost spell damage, spawns 4 non-ricocheting projectiles, and applies to you Regeneration X for 1 tick.
spell.invoke.essence_drain.name: Essence Drail
spell.invoke.flame_geyser.description: Rupture the area underneath you, launching nearby enemies into the sky while dealing {damage} fire damage..
spell.invoke.flame_geyser.name: Flame Geyser
spell.invoke.flameray.description: Channel to fire a very brief ray of flame, dealing {damage} fire spell damage per second, for half a second.
spell.invoke.flameray.name: Disintegrating Ray
spell.invoke.freezeaura.description: Toggle on and off an aura that sets enemies around you freezing for 10 seconds, refreshing as they stay in the area. Consumes a frost rune per enemy frozen this way.
spell.invoke.freezeaura.name: Freezing Aura
spell.invoke.frozen_resonance.descriptio: Channel to deal {damage} frost damage in an area around you 5 times a second. One mini-glacier within a bigger area will also deal this same frost damage in an area around it. If there are no mini-glaciers in an area around you, four of them will be summoned nearby.
spell.invoke.frozen_resonance.name: Frozen Resonance
spell.invoke.glacialhammer.description: Slam down your weapon, dealing {damage} frost damage to enemies in front of you and encasing the first one hit in a mini-glacier, which deals glacial cascade damage. You can shatter mini-glaciers with the slam, dealing the same damage again in an area.
spell.invoke.glacialhammer.name: Glacial Hammer
spell.invoke.glacier.description: Summon a sequence of four mini-glaciers, each gaining one size after the last. Deals 50% base damage in an area per size. Base damage is {damage} frost damage.
spell.invoke.glacier.name: Glacial Cascade
spell.invoke.gon.description: Blast one enemy with arcane energy, dealing {damage} arcane damage. Grants one level of Arcane Power on hit, up to 3.
spell.invoke.gon.name: Arcane Invocation: Gon
spell.invoke.greater_combust.description: Channel to deal {damage} fire DPS to a single enemy.
spell.invoke.greater_combust.name: Inflame
spell.invoke.greater_fireball.descriptio: Shoot an overloaded fireball in a direction, dealing more ({damage}) fire spell damage in an 8 block radius.
spell.invoke.greater_fireball.name: Greater Fireball
spell.invoke.heo.description: Conjure a block of ice on an enemy, dealing {damage} frost damage. Grants one level of Frost Power on hit, up to 3.
spell.invoke.heo.name: Frost Invocation: Heo
spell.invoke.hijack.description: Throw an ender pearl with your target's name on it.
spell.invoke.hijack.name: Hijack
spell.invoke.homing.description: Shoot a stream of four fireballs that ricochet off of enemies and bounce off of surfaces, dealing {damage} fire spell damage per fireball.
spell.invoke.homing.name: Flame Stream
spell.invoke.ice_nova.description: Perform a chilling nova around you, chilling enemies and dealing {damage} frost damage.
spell.invoke.ice_nova.name: Ice Nova
spell.invoke.icebarrage.description: Channel to release a barrage of frostbolts, dealing {damage} frost dps.
spell.invoke.icebarrage.name: Ice Barrage
spell.invoke.icestorm.description: Channel to release a great barrage of frostbolts, dealing 3x {damage} frost dps.
spell.invoke.icestorm.name: Icestorm
spell.invoke.inferno.description: Three explosive meteors drop on the target enemy or area, dealing {damage} fire damage in a large area.
spell.invoke.inferno.name: Ragnarok
spell.invoke.magic_missile.description: {damage} Arcane DPS. Channel to queue projectiles against your current target. Upon releasing and while the spell is on cooldown, all built up projectiles will sequentially shoot out, targeting whatever you were targeting at the time they were queued.
spell.invoke.magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
spell.invoke.mass_hypothermia.descriptio: Freezing winds chill the nearby area, dealing {damage} dps to nearby enemies while slowing them..
spell.invoke.mass_hypothermia.name: Mass Hypothermia
spell.invoke.meteorrush.description: Transform into a being of pure flame, launching yourself forwards and exploding for {damage} fire spell damage in a radius of 8 blocks when you stop channeling.
spell.invoke.meteorrush.name: Trailblaze
spell.invoke.nullinvoke.description: You have no Invocation Power. Cast with a Null Rune to dispel Invocation Magic from this item.
spell.invoke.nullinvoke.name: Invocation: Null
spell.invoke.onearcane.description: Invoke arcane power, adding one Invocation Power.
spell.invoke.onearcane.name: Invoke Arcane I
spell.invoke.onefire.description: Invoke the power of fire, adding one Invocation Power.
spell.invoke.onefire.name: Invoke Flames I
spell.invoke.onefrost.description: Invoke the power of frost, adding one Invocation Power.
spell.invoke.onefrost.name: Invoke Frost I
spell.invoke.overload.description: Unstable arcane energies blast all enemies nearby, sending them flying away, dealing {damage} arcane damage.
spell.invoke.overload.name: Overload
spell.invoke.power_word_kill.description: Compel a single enemy to die. If they have less than or equal to {damage} health, scaling with Arcane power, they die instantly. Has no effect otherwise.
spell.invoke.power_word_kill.name: Power Word: Kill
spell.invoke.rah.description: Shoot a fireball, dealing {damage} fire damage. Grants one level of Fire Power on hit, up to 3.
spell.invoke.rah.name: Fire Invocation: Rah
spell.invoke.runic_invocation.descriptio: When you cast a spell, you gain a rune of the corresponding element. Cast this spell to spend these runes, invoking a more powerful spell.
spell.invoke.runic_invocation.name: Astral Invocation
spell.invoke.scorching_agony.description: Channel to scorch an enemy over a duration, dealing {damage} fire spell damage per second.
spell.invoke.scorching_agony.name: Scorching Agony
spell.invoke.scorching_ray.description: Launch a piercing ray of flame in the target direction, dealing {damage} fire damage.
spell.invoke.scorching_ray.name: Scorching Ray
spell.invoke.scorchingwind.description: Scorch the area around you with a burning wind, launching enemies, setting them on fire, and dealing {damage} fire spell damage.
spell.invoke.scorchingwind.name: Scorching Nova
spell.invoke.sharedsuffering.description: Channel to deal {damage} frost DPS to a single enemy, freezing both of you. You gain increasing frost power as you channel.
spell.invoke.sharedsuffering.name: Shared Suffering
spell.invoke.shatter.description: Embolden the frost on an enemy, dealing {damage} frost damage and adding an additional slowness stack on them.
spell.invoke.shatter.name: Frostbite
spell.invoke.snare.description: Deal {damage} to an enemy and lower their movement speed to 0.
spell.invoke.snare.name: Snare
spell.invoke.sonicboom.description: Launch a Sonic Boom in the targeted direction, dealing {damage} arcane spell damage to the first enemy hit.
spell.invoke.sonicboom.name: Sonic Boom
spell.invoke.supernova.description: Explode violently in a large area around you, dealing {damage} fire spell damage in a 12 block radius.
spell.invoke.supernova.name: Supernova
spell.invoke.threearcane.description: Invoke eldritch power, adding three Invocation Power
spell.invoke.threearcane.name: Invoke Arcane III
spell.invoke.threefire.description: Invoke the power of the inferno, adding three Invocation Power
spell.invoke.threefire.name: Invoke Flames III
spell.invoke.threefrost.description: Invoke the power of frostbite, adding three Invocation Power
spell.invoke.threefrost.name: Invoke Frost III
spell.invoke.time_dilate.description: Deal {damage} damage to nearby enemies, slowing them while speeding yourself up.
spell.invoke.time_dilate.name: Time Dilate
spell.invoke.twoarcane.description: Invoke the power of the occult, adding two Invocation Power
spell.invoke.twoarcane.name: Invoke Arcane II
spell.invoke.twofire.description: Invoke the power of flame, adding two Invocation Power
spell.invoke.twofire.name: Invoke Flames II
spell.invoke.twofrost.description: Invoke the power of rime, adding two Invocation Power
spell.invoke.twofrost.name: Invoke Frost II
spell.invoke.upheaval.description: Channel to select as many enemies as you want. Enemies selected get one mini-glacier spawned underneath them, dealing Glacial Cascade damage.
spell.invoke.upheaval.name: Glacial Upheaval
spell.invoke.wild.description: Reach in and pull out a random invocation.
spell.invoke.wild.name: Invoke Wild Magic
